sect2.title: iModulus
sect2.para: modis the parser recognized symbol for this operator. This operator can be used on both integer types and fractional types.

The dividend is subtracted from the divisor until the divisor cannot be subtracted from what remains of the dividend without changing the sign of the remainder of the dividend. this operator returns what remains of the dividend. The number of times the divisor can be subtracted from the dividend can be accessed via the integer division (iDiv) operator.

example.title: Example
example.programlisting: select TableDee add {17 mod 5 IntDiv, 1.2 mod 0.35 DecIntDiv };
